page.title: 12PEOPLE AND THEIR JOBS.
page.content:
Here are the views of people in Wisbech concerning the jobs they do:
I work at Tescos supermarket and have done for 1 yr.I work 5 days a week and work hard.My pay should be better and I would like longer holidays.
I work at a chip shop having previously been at a newsagents.I do shift work 4 days a week.It would be nice to have more ventilation.
I have been a solicitor for 20yrs.following some time in the airforce.I work an 8hr.day 5 days a week.I think my pay is good.
I have been a council worker for 22yrs.Before that I was a milkman.I work 5 days a week and up to 10hrs. a day.The pay is low and the supervision
